titles.title: Federal Forage Fee Act of 1993
A bill to establish a forage fee formula on lands under the jurisdiction of the Department of Agriculture and the Department of the Interior.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9983-9986)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Federal Forage Fee Act of 1993 - Subjects grazing operations on Federal land to applicable Federal, State, and local environmental and land use requirements. Sets forth a forage fee formula for lands under the jurisdiction of the Department of Agriculture and the Department of the Interior.
